function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Breakthrough infections despite vaccine launch","Impact":"Continued spread and persistence of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Continued surveillance, testing, and development of booster shots","Technologies":"Vaccine development and distribution, surveillance systems","People":"Global population","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about future pandemics","Impact":"Potential lack of preparedness and rapid response","Mitigation":"Investment in research, surveillance, and infrastructure for early detection and response","Technologies":"Early warning systems, surveillance technologies","People":"Global scientific community, public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, governments"},{"Description":"Economic impact of infectious diseases","Impact":"Severe disruption of economic activities and global economy","Mitigation":"Investment in public health infrastructure, development of strategies for economic resilience","Technologies":"Economic modeling, public health infrastructure development","People":"Governments, global business community","Owner":"Public and private sectors"}]}
